languages.text: "Я, конечно, мог вытащить из тебя эту дрянь, но подумал — зачем? Считай, что это гарантия твоей мне благодарности. Когда отработаешь свое лечение — я тебя от нее освобожу". {n}Безгубый рот растягивается в плотоядном оскале-ухмылке.{/n}

"I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я, конечно, мог вытащить из тебя эту дрянь, но подумал — зачем? Считай, что это гарантия твоей мне благодарности. Когда отработаешь свое лечение — я тебя от нее освобожу". {n}Безгубый рот растягивается в плотоядном оскале-ухмылке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “我当时本可以把那玩意儿从你身体里拔出来，但我转念一想，我干嘛要拔呢？就当这是到保险吧，确保你会感激我救了你一命。等你赢来了你的治疗资格之后，我就会把那条蛆取出来。”{n}他没有嘴唇的嘴露出了嗜血的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我当时本可以把那玩意儿从你身体里拔出来，但我转念一想，我干嘛要拔呢？就当这是到保险吧，确保你会感激我救了你一命。等你赢来了你的治疗资格之后，我就会把那条蛆取出来。”{n}他没有嘴唇的嘴露出了嗜血的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Podría haberte sacado esa cosa, claro, pero ¿por qué iba a hacerlo? Considéralo una garantía de tu gratitud. Cuando te hayas ganado la curación, te libraré de él». {n}La boca sin labios esboza una sonrisa sanguinaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Podría haberte sacado esa cosa, claro, pero ¿por qué iba a hacerlo? Considéralo una garantía de tu gratitud. Cuando te hayas ganado la curación, te libraré de él». {n}La boca sin labios esboza una sonrisa sanguinaria.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「あの時に取り除いてやってもよかったが、それではもったいない。貴様が借りを返すまでの担保としておく。十分に尽くしてくれたら、貴様の身体から取り除いてやろう」{n}唇のない口が、血に飢えた笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あの時に取り除いてやってもよかったが、それではもったいない。貴様が借りを返すまでの担保としておく。十分に尽くしてくれたら、貴様の身体から取り除いてやろう」{n}唇のない口が、血に飢えた笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Ich hätte das Ding natürlich aus Euch herausziehen können, doch ich dachte mir ... warum sollte ich? Seht es als Garantie meiner Dankbarkeit Euch gegenüber. Wenn Ihr Euch Eure Heilung verdient habt, entlasse ich Euch daraus." {n}Der lippenlose Mund verzieht sich zu einem blutrünstigen Grinsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte das Ding natürlich aus Euch herausziehen können, doch ich dachte mir ... warum sollte ich? Seht es als Garantie meiner Dankbarkeit Euch gegenüber. Wenn Ihr Euch Eure Heilung verdient habt, entlasse ich Euch daraus." {n}Der lippenlose Mund verzieht sich zu einem blutrünstigen Grinsen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « J'aurais pu vous extraire cette bestiole, bien sûr, mais je me suis dit qu'il était plus sage de vous le laisser. Disons que c'est une garantie de votre gratitude envers moi. Quand vous l'aurez mérité, je vous en libérerai. » {n}Sa bouche sans lèvres s'étire pour former un sourire sanguinaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'aurais pu vous extraire cette bestiole, bien sûr, mais je me suis dit qu'il était plus sage de vous le laisser. Disons que c'est une garantie de votre gratitude envers moi. Quand vous l'aurez mérité, je vous en libérerai. » {n}Sa bouche sans lèvres s'étire pour former un sourire sanguinaire.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "O kurdu söküp alabilirdim ama... Neden yapayım ki bunu? Daha bana minnet göstereceksin, o yüzden dokunmadım. İyileş diye girdiğim zahmetlerin karşılığını verirsen icabına bakarız." {n}Dudaksız ağzı, iştahla sırıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could have pulled that thing out of you, of course, but I thought — why should I? Consider it a guarantee of your gratitude toward me. When you've earned your healing, I'll release you from it." {n}The lipless mouth stretches into a bloodthirsty grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "O kurdu söküp alabilirdim ama... Neden yapayım ki bunu? Bana duyduğun minnetin simgesi olsun. İyileş diye girdiğim zahmetlerin karşılığını verirsen icabına bakarız." {n}Dudaksız ağzı iştahlıca sırıtıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger
